puzzles.title: VWLLSS CRSSWRD, 1/2/09 (Friday) [This crossword has all of its vowels removed. Enter the consonants into the grid. The letter Y is not a part of any answer. For answers, see http://www.cruciverb.com/sunvowellessanswers.pdf. Coming this spring to a bookstore near you: "Vowelless Crosswords" by Frank Longo]
